Step:3 Hold the dumbbell with a hammer grip, meaning your palms are facing each other and your fingers are wrapped around the handle.
Step:4 Keeping your core engaged and your back straight, slowly raise your heel as high as possible by pushing through the ball of your foot.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heel back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other leg.

name: Smith Seated One Leg Calf Raise
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the machine with your back against the pad and your feet on the footrest.
Step:2 Place one leg on the footrest and keep the other leg off the footrest.
Step:3 Using your calf muscles, raise your heel as high as possible.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heel back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs and repeat.

name: Sled Forward Angled Calf Raise
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the sled machine to a comfortable weight and position yourself on the machine with your toes on the platform and your heels hanging off.
Step:2 Place your hands on the handles or the sides of the machine for support.
Step:3 Engage your calves and slowly raise your heels as high as possible, pushing against the resistance of the sled.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Sled Calf Press on Leg Press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat of the leg press machine so that your knees are slightly bent when your feet are on the sled.
Step:2 Place your feet shoulder-width apart on the sled, with your toes pointing forward.
Step:3 Release the safety handles and push the sled away from you by extending your knees and ankles.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly lower the sled back down by bending your knees and ankles.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Hack One Leg Calf Raise
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the sled machine to an appropriate weight.
Step:2 Stand on the sled machine with one foot, keeping the other foot off the ground.
Step:3 Hold onto the handles for stability.
Step:4 Raise your heel as high as possible, lifting your body up on the ball of your foot.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heel back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
Step:7 Switch legs and repeat the exercise.

name: Lever Lying Leg Curl
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the machine to fit your body and select the desired weight.
Step:2 Lie face down on the machine with your legs straight and your heels against the padded lever.
Step:3 Grasp the handles or the sides of the machine for stability.
Step:4 Keeping your upper body stationary, exhale and curl your legs up as far as possible without lifting your hips off the pad.
Step:5 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your hamstrings.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly lower the lever back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Lever Seated Leg Curl
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the machine to fit your body and sit on it with your back against the backrest.
Step:2 Place your lower legs under the padded lever, just above your ankles.
Step:3 Grasp the handles on the sides of the machine for support.
Step:4 Keeping your upper legs stationary, exhale and curl your legs up as far as possible.
Step:5 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your hamstrings.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly lower the lever back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Lever Kneeling Leg Curl
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the machine to fit your body and select the desired weight.
Step:2 Kneel on the machine facing downwards, with your knees resting on the pad and your feet secured under the footpads.
Step:3 Grasp the handles or the sides of the machine for stability.
Step:4 Keeping your upper body stationary, exhale and curl your legs up towards your glutes by flexing your knees.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, squeezing your hamstrings.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly lower your legs back to the starting position, fully extending your knees.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Cable Assisted Inverse Leg Curl
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the cable machine so that the ankle attachment is at the lowest setting.
Step:2 Lie face down on the bench with your legs straight and the ankle attachment secured to your ankles.
Step:3 Hold onto the handles of the bench for stability.
Step:4 Keeping your upper body stationary, exhale and curl your legs up towards your glutes by flexing your knees.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, squeezing your hamstrings.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly lower your legs back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Lever Seated Hip Abduction
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height so that your knees are at a 90-degree angle.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your back against the backrest and your feet on the footrests.
Step:3 Place your hands on the side handles for stability.
Step:4 Engage your abductors and slowly push your legs apart, away from the midline of your body.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the end of the movement, then slowly bring your legs back together to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Lever Seated Hip Adduction
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your back against the backrest.
Step:2 Place your feet on the footrests and grasp the handles for stability.
Step:3 Engage your adductor muscles and slowly bring your legs together, squeezing your inner thighs.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the peak contraction, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Squat on Bosu Ball
instructions: Step:1 Place the bosu ball on the ground with the flat side up.
Step:2 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and position yourself on top of the bosu ball.
Step:3 Lower your body down by bending your knees and hips, as if sitting back into a chair.
Step:4 Keep your chest up and your weight on your heels.
Step:5 Lower yourself until your thighs are parallel to the ground.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Barbell Press Sit-up
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back on a mat with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold the barbell with an overhand grip, resting it on your chest.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, slowly lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward until your torso is at a 45-degree angle.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Weighted Donkey Calf Raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand on a raised platform with your toes on the edge and your heels hanging off.
Step:2 Hold onto a stable object for support.
Step:3 Raise your heels as high as possible by extending your ankles.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Tire Flip
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, facing the tire.
Step:2 Bend your knees and hinge at the hips, lowering into a squat position.
Step:3 Reach down and grab the bottom edge of the tire with both hands, fingers facing towards you.
Step:4 Engage your glutes and leg muscles, and explosively drive through your legs to lift the tire off the ground.
Step:5 As the tire flips over, use your upper body strength to guide it and maintain control.
Step:6 Once the tire is fully flipped, quickly step back and reset your stance.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Barbell Sumo Deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet wider than shoulder-width apart, toes pointing outwards.
Step:2 Place a barbell on the ground in front of you, centered between your feet.
Step:3 Bend your knees and lower your hips, keeping your back straight and chest up, to grip the barbell with an overhand grip.
Step:4 Engage your core and drive through your heels to lift the barbell off the ground, extending your hips and knees simultaneously.
Step:5 As you lift, keep your chest up and back straight, and push your hips forward to fully engage your glutes.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the barbell back down to the starting position, maintaining control throughout the movement.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Sled Forward Angled Calf Raise
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the sled machine to a comfortable weight and position yourself on the machine with your toes on the platform and your heels hanging off.
Step:2 Place your hands on the handles or the sides of the machine for support.
Step:3 Engage your calves and slowly raise your heels as high as possible, pushing against the resistance of the sled.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Smith Chair Squat
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the height of the smith machine bar to a comfortable position.
Step:2 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes slightly turned out.
Step:3 Place the barbell across your upper back, resting it on your traps.
Step:4 Engage your core and keep your chest up as you slowly lower your body by bending your knees and hips.
Step:5 Continue lowering until your thighs are parallel to the ground, or as low as you can comfortably go.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Weighted Crunch
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a weight plate or dumbbell on your chest.
Step:3 Engage your abs and lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward until your shoulder blades are off the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Cable Seated Crunch
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a cable machine with your feet flat on the ground and your knees bent.
Step:2 Hold the cable handle with both hands and position it behind your head.
Step:3 Engage your abs and slowly curl your upper body forward, bringing your chest towards your knees.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Lever Seated Crunch
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the leverage machine with your back against the pad and your feet flat on the floor.
Step:2 Grasp the handles or place your hands on the side pads for support.
Step:3 Engage your abs and slowly lean back, allowing the pad to move with you.
Step:4 Once your upper body is at a 45-degree angle, contract your abs and crunch forward, bringing your chest towards your knees.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly release and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Cable Kneeling Crunch
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope handle to a high pulley and kneel down facing away from the machine.
Step:2 Hold the rope handle with both hands and place it behind your head, keeping your elbows out to the sides.
Step:3 Keeping your hips stationary, flex your waist and crunch your torso down towards your thighs.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Jackknife Sit-up
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs extended and your arms overhead.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your legs and upper body simultaneously, reaching your hands towards your toes.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs and upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Tuck Crunch
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, lift your shoulder blades off the ground and bring your knees towards your chest, simultaneously curling your upper body towards your knees.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your shoulder blades and extend your legs back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Bottoms-up
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs extended and your arms by your sides.
Step:2 Bend your knees and bring them towards your chest, keeping your feet off the ground.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, lift your hips off the ground, bringing your knees towards your head.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Reverse Crunch
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your arms extended along your sides.
Step:2 Bend your knees and lift your feet off the ground, bringing your thighs perpendicular to the floor.
Step:3 Contract your abs and curl your hips off the floor, bringing your knees towards your chest.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Lying Elbow to Knee
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Step:3 Engage your abs and lift your upper body off the ground, bringing your right elbow towards your left knee.
Step:4 At the same time, extend your right leg straight out and lift it off the ground.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat the movement, this time bringing your left elbow towards your right knee and extending your left leg.
Step:7 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Alternate Heel Touchers
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight out to the sides, parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, lift your shoulders off the ground and reach your right hand towards your right heel.
Step:4 Return to the starting position and repeat on the left side, reaching your left hand towards your left heel.
Step:5 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Band Bicycle Crunch
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your hands behind your head and your knees bent.
Step:2 Lift your feet off the ground and bring your right knee towards your chest while simultaneously twisting your torso to bring your left elbow towards your right knee.
Step:3 Straighten your right leg while bringing your left knee towards your chest and twisting your torso to bring your right elbow towards your left knee.
Step:4 Continue alternating the twisting motion, as if you are pedaling a bicycle, while keeping your core engaged throughout the movement.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Barbell Standing Ab Rollerout
instructions: Step:1 Stand upright with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the barbell with both hands in front of your thighs.
Step:2 Engage your core and slowly roll the barbell down towards the ground, keeping your back straight and your arms extended.
Step:3 Continue rolling the barbell forward until your body is fully extended and your hands are directly above your head.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly roll the barbell back towards your thighs, maintaining control and keeping your core engaged.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Standing Wheel Rollerout
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing tall with your feet shoulder-width apart and the wheel roller in front of you.
Step:2 Bend at your waist and slowly roll the wheel forward, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:3 Continue rolling forward until you feel a stretch in your abs and your body is extended as far as possible.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly roll the wheel back towards your body, returning to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Roller Body Saw
instructions: Step:1 Start in a plank position with your forearms on the roller and your body in a straight line.
Step:2 Engage your core and slowly roll the roller forward, extending your body as far as you can while maintaining control.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the furthest point, then slowly roll the roller back towards your starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Weighted Front Plank
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying face down on the floor.
Step:2 Place your forearms on the ground, with your elbows directly under your shoulders.
Step:3 Extend your legs straight out behind you, with your toes on the ground.
Step:4 Engage your core and lift your body off the ground, balancing on your forearms and toes.
Step:5 Keep your body in a straight line from your head to your heels.
Step:6 Hold this position for the desired amount of time.
Step:7 Lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Bodyweight Incline Side Plank
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying on your side with your legs extended and stacked on top of each other.
Step:2 Place your forearm on the ground directly below your shoulder, with your elbow bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:3 Engage your core and lift your hips off the ground, creating a straight line from your head to your feet.
Step:4 Hold this position for the desired amount of time.
Step:5 Lower your hips back down to the ground and repeat on the other side.

name: Side Plank Hip Adduction
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying on your side with your legs extended and stacked on top of each other.
Step:2 Prop yourself up on your forearm, keeping your elbow directly below your shoulder.
Step:3 Engage your core and lift your hips off the ground, creating a straight line from your head to your feet.
Step:4 While maintaining the side plank position, lift your top leg towards the ceiling, keeping it straight.
Step:5 Slowly lower your leg back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

name: Run
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing upright with your feet hip-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and keep your upper body relaxed.
Step:3 Begin jogging in place, lifting your knees up towards your chest and landing softly on the balls of your feet.
Step:4 Maintain a steady pace and continue jogging for the desired duration or distance.
Step:5 Remember to breathe deeply and maintain good posture throughout the exercise.

name: Astride Jumps (Male)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Bend your knees and lower your body into a squat position.
Step:3 Jump explosively upwards, extending your legs and arms.
Step:4 While in the air, spread your legs apart and bring your arms out to the sides.
Step:5 Land softly with your feet shoulder-width apart, bending your knees to absorb the impact.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Ski Step
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and keep your back straight.
Step:3 Jump to the right, landing on your right foot while swinging your left leg behind your right leg.
Step:4 Immediately jump to the left, landing on your left foot while swinging your right leg behind your left leg.
Step:5 Continue alternating jumps from side to side, mimicking a skiing motion.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Swing 360
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Hold your arms straight out in front of you, parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Engage your core and swing your arms in a circular motion, rotating your torso as you do so.
Step:4 Continue the circular motion, swinging your arms and rotating your torso for the desired number of repetitions.
Step:5 Remember to breathe throughout the exercise.

name: Short Stride Run
instructions: Step:1 Find an open space or a treadmill to perform the exercise.
Step:2 Stand tall with your feet hip-width apart.
Step:3 Start jogging in place, lifting your knees high and pumping your arms.
Step:4 After a few seconds, start taking short strides forward, maintaining a quick pace.
Step:5 Continue running with short strides for the desired duration or distance.

name: Wind Sprints
instructions: Step:1 Find an open space or a track to perform the exercise.
Step:2 Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Begin running as fast as you can, pumping your arms and driving your knees up.
Step:4 Continue sprinting for a specific distance or time period.
Step:5 Rest and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Stationary Bike Run
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position to ensure proper alignment.
Step:2 Place your feet on the pedals and secure them with the straps if available.
Step:3 Start pedaling at a comfortable pace.
Step:4 Maintain a steady rhythm and increase the resistance as desired.
Step:5 Engage your core muscles to maintain stability and proper posture.
Step:6 Continue pedaling for the desired duration of your workout.
Step:7 Gradually decrease the resistance and slow down before coming to a complete stop.
Step:8 Stretch your legs and cool down after the workout.

name: Kettlebell One Arm Jerk
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell in one hand at shoulder height.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and engage your core.
Step:3 Press the kettlebell overhead in a straight line, fully extending your arm.
Step:4 As you press the kettlebell overhead, simultaneously dip your knees and quickly straighten them to generate momentum.
Step:5 As the kettlebell reaches its highest point, quickly drop underneath it by bending your knees and hips.
Step:6 Catch the kettlebell with a slight bend in your knees and hips, and your arm fully extended overhead.
Step:7 Stand up straight, fully extending your knees and hips, and stabilize the kettlebell overhead.
Step:8 Lower the kettlebell back to the starting position by bending your knees and hips, and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Barbell Thruster
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a barbell at shoulder height with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Lower into a squat position by bending your knees and pushing your hips back.
Step:3 As you reach the bottom of the squat, explosively drive through your heels to stand up, simultaneously pressing the barbell overhead.
Step:4 Lower the barbell back to shoulder height as you lower back into the squat position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Kettlebell Turkish Get Up (Squat Style)
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying on your back with your legs extended and the kettlebell held in your right hand, arm fully extended above your shoulder.
Step:2 Bend your right knee and place your right foot flat on the ground, keeping your left leg extended.
Step:3 Pressing through your right foot, lift your hips off the ground, coming into a bridge position.
Step:4 Slide your left leg underneath your body, bending your left knee and placing your left foot flat on the ground.
Step:5 Rotate your torso to the left, bringing your left hand to the ground for support.
Step:6 Pressing through your right foot and left hand, lift your torso off the ground, coming into a kneeling position.
Step:7 From the kneeling position, stand up, keeping the kettlebell extended overhead.
Step:8 Reverse the movement to return to the starting position.
Step:9 Repeat the exercise on the other side, starting with the kettlebell in your left hand.

name: Kettlebell Double Windmill
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell in your right hand.
Step:2 Extend your right arm overhead, keeping your eyes on the kettlebell.
Step:3 Rotate your left foot 45 degrees to the left and your right foot 90 degrees to the right.
Step:4 Bend at the waist to the left, keeping your right arm extended overhead.
Step:5 Lower the kettlebell towards the ground, reaching towards your left foot.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then engage your core and push through your right foot to return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

name: Plyo Push Up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Lower your chest towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping your body in a straight line.
Step:3 Push explosively off the ground, using your chest muscles to propel your upper body off the ground.
Step:4 Land softly with your hands back in the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Push-up Inside Leg Kick
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart and your feet together.
Step:2 Lower your body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:3 As you push back up, lift one leg off the ground and kick it out to the side, keeping it straight.
Step:4 Lower your leg back down and repeat the push-up, then switch to the other leg.
Step:5 Continue alternating leg kicks with each push-up repetition.

name: Barbell Clean and Press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and the barbell on the floor in front of you.
Step:2 Bend your knees and hinge at the hips to lower down and grip the barbell with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Drive through your heels and extend your hips and knees to lift the barbell off the floor, keeping it close to your body.
Step:4 As the barbell reaches your thighs, explosively extend your hips, shrug your shoulders, and pull the barbell up towards your chest.
Step:5 As the barbell reaches chest height, quickly drop under it and catch it at shoulder level, with your elbows pointing forward and your palms facing up.
Step:6 From the catch position, press the barbell overhead by extending your arms and pushing the barbell straight up.
Step:7 Lower the barbell back down to the starting position and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Handstand
instructions: Step:1 Find an open space with enough room to perform a handstand.
Step:2 Place your hands on the ground shoulder-width apart, fingers pointing forward.
Step:3 Kick your legs up towards the wall, using your core and shoulders to maintain balance.
Step:4 Once in a handstand position, engage your triceps to support your body weight.
Step:5 Hold the handstand for as long as you can maintain balance.
Step:6 To come down, slowly lower your legs back to the ground.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Sphinx
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on the ground with your forearms flat on the floor, elbows directly under your shoulders.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your chest off the ground, keeping your forearms and toes on the floor.
Step:3 Hold this position for a few seconds, making sure to keep your neck in a neutral position.
Step:4 Slowly lower your chest back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Full Planche
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands shoulder-width apart and your fingers pointing forward.
Step:2 Engage your core and slowly shift your weight forward, lifting your feet off the ground.
Step:3 Continue shifting your weight forward until your body is parallel to the ground, balancing on your hands.
Step:4 Hold this position for as long as you can, maintaining a straight body line.
Step:5 Slowly lower your feet back to the ground and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Tire Flip
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, facing the tire.
Step:2 Bend your knees and hinge at the hips, lowering into a squat position.
Step:3 Reach down and grab the bottom edge of the tire with both hands, fingers facing towards you.
Step:4 Engage your glutes and leg muscles, and explosively drive through your legs to lift the tire off the ground.
Step:5 As the tire flips over, use your upper body strength to guide it and maintain control.
Step:6 Once the tire is fully flipped, quickly step back and reset your stance.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Burpee
instructions: Step:1 Start in a standing position with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Lower your body into a squat position by bending your knees and placing your hands on the floor in front of you.
Step:3 Kick your feet back into a push-up position.
Step:4 Perform a push-up, keeping your body in a straight line.
Step:5 Jump your feet back into the squat position.
Step:6 Jump up explosively, reaching your arms overhead.
Step:7 Land softly and immediately lower back into a squat position to begin the next repetition.
